alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampshire; Western Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:34PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hartford, south central Hampshire and eastern Hampden Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Granby, or 8 miles southwest of Agawam, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Enfield, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Windsor, Agawam, West Springfield, Simsbury, Ludlow, Bloomfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Belchertown, Wilbraham and Windsor Locks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
